summary: High Quality or Performance presets, powered by all the features of the latest enbseries.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center]


Features[/center][/b]
[center]● ENB is completely standalone. No requirements. No hassle.
● Edge Anti-Aliasing, Temporal Anti-Aliasing, light Sharpening and smooth use of Blur to bring the highest quality image.
● Cinematic and natural look. Has a soft feel to it, but balanced.
● All artificial fog has been removed.
● Dynamic interior lighting, changing based on the time of day.
● Dynamic water movement, wave and ripple intensity, based on the time of day.
● High quality SSS to make the skin look realistic as possible.
● High Quality and Performance Preset to choose from, along with Letterbox or no Letterbox.
● And much more. ENB is still in Beta phase, so more tweaks and features will be included and improved over time.[/center]






[right][b]CREDITS[/b]
[i]Boris, creator of ENB.
Kyo, Matso, Jawz, and others all who bring in extra little details to life.
Other ENBs in general, I got a good sense of the type of ENB I wanted, and I didn't just want to 'tweak' someone elses ENB a little and call it my own.
Redbull.[/i][/right]
author: Vainlash aka DanteVSTheWorld
